description.narrative: This activity (CHASE Humanitarian Emergency Secondments Facility) is a component of Humanitarian Emergency Response Operations and Stabilisation Programme (HEROS) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £2,534,298. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Material relief assistance and services . , with the following implementing partners: CANADEM, Danish Refugee Council, Norwegian Refugee Council, Palladium International Ltd (UK), RedR, United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA). The start date is 01-11-2017 and the end date is 28-10-2022.

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA)

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
